predicate.note: Frames file for 'oversee' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'manage'.

roleset.name: supervise

example.name: they all look like this
example.text: Mr. Horton, who *trace* oversaw Gulf Power's governmental-affairs efforts, died mysteriously in a plane crash...

roleset.note: "Oversee" is a portmanteau for "supervise"; "over" = "super" and "see" = "vise" (eg, "vision" etc).
